td.div:
School Board Meeting for Tuesday, April 21
The LakeVille Board of Education Meeting for Tuesday, April 21 will be live streamed at 7:00PM at this link.
During the event you will be able to submit comments to the Board by entering your name and email address on the site.
Essential Workers
Wednesday, April 1, 2020
Per Executive Order 2020-21 issued by Governor Whitmer on 3/23/2020, LakeVille Community Schools identifies the following roles as essential:
Administration
Business Operations
Food Service
Maintenance/Custodial (as needed)
Transportation (as needed)
Technology Services
Secretarial (as needed)
Free Food Opportunity!
Knowing that our community relies on the district to provide meals during the schools day for our students, we have developed a meal system to feed our students during this shutdown. We will be able to provide two meals a day per child! Please click HERE for details!
​Thank you Carrie Strait, Lawrissa Peterson, Dean Transportation and the LakeVille Food Service Team for making this happen!
